outputs.output_descr: The program is aimed to strengthen the national partners' activities to effectively tackle the issues of HIV/AIDS and Occupational Safety Health (OSH) at the formal and informal sectors through having dedicated leadership, knowledgeable trainers, strong OSH and HIV/AIDS Unit and committees, well-organized training and documentation centre, and well-tailored HIV/AIDS and OSH programmes at all levels.

The program is aimed to strengthen the national partners' activities to effectively tackle the issues of HIV/AIDS and Occupational Safety Health (OSH) at the formal and informal sectors through having dedicated leadership, knowledgeable trainers, strong OSH and HIV/AIDS Unit and committees, well-organized training and documentation centre, and well-tailored HIV/AIDS and OSH programmes at all levels.

project_descr: HIVAIDS workplace programmes run in large private and public enteprises through the coordination of the National Confederation of Eritrean Workers
project_title: HIV/AIDS Intervention Programmes in the Workplace
